wikitext.*:
The '''Captains of the West''' were nobles of [[Gondor]] and other allied forces that participated to the latter stages of the [[War of the Ring]], namely leading the [[Army of the West]].

These were  [[Gandalf]], [[Aragorn]], [[Éomer]], [[Imrahil]] and other lords,<ref>{{RK|V9}}</ref> perhaps including [[Elladan]] and [[Elrohir]],<ref>{{HM|Guide}}, p. 62</ref> and they led the allied Army against the [[Morannon|gates]] of [[Mordor]] and the ensuing [[Battle of the Morannon]].<ref>{{RK|V10}}</ref>
